channel.title: A bunch of questions
channel.description:
I believe Attack Bonuses don't do a thing on a PimpScape source since I tested +1000 and -1000 it didn't make much a difference if any.
So attack bonuses don't do anything either like defence? And are mage attack bonuses the same way? Is there a way - or a tutorial - to fix this?
and how can I make the ladders and stairs go down/up in Ape Atoll? if you go up one, you can't go back down, then there's some you can go up from the place below ape atoll but you can't go down them.
How can I change a spell's name such as Wind Strike?
And my last thing is, since it was a requested item for shops, how can I fix the arms on woven tops, etc - because the body is normal but you still see your normal clothes arms instead of it's.
this is what it looks like: [IMG]http://i169.photobucket.com/albums/u221/zer0z7/top.jpg[/img] This is what it's [i]supposed[/i] to look like: [IMG]http://i169.photobucket.com/albums/u221/zer0z7/fixedtop.png[/img] as you notice, in the first pic - the body goes into the right spot so iuno how to fix it..
Help from any greatly appreciated :)

item.title: A bunch of questions
item.dc:creator: @Simply_Z3R0 Simply Z3R0
item.description:
@Simply_Z3R0 wrote:

I believe Attack Bonuses don’t do a thing on a PimpScape source since I tested +1000 and -1000 it didn’t make much a difference if any.

So attack bonuses don’t do anything either like defence?
And are mage attack bonuses the same way?
Is there a way - or a tutorial - to fix this?

and how can I make the ladders and stairs go down/up in Ape Atoll?
if you go up one, you can’t go back down, then there’s some you can go up from the place below ape atoll but you can’t go down them.

How can I change a spell’s name such as Wind Strike?

And my last thing is, since it was a requested item for shops, how can I fix the arms on woven tops, etc - because the body is normal but you still see your normal clothes arms instead of it’s.

this is what it looks like:

This is what it’s supposed to look like:

as you notice, in the first pic - the body goes into the right spot so iuno how to fix it…

Help from any greatly appreciated
